title: Delta cuts flights at its major hubs
text:
Delta Air Lines is making large cuts in flying at its hubs, including a 60% reduction in flights at its largest hub in Atlanta.

Delta in Atlanta, like other airlines, has cut the vast majority of its flights in New York, a hot spot for the coronavirus outbreak in the...
